'''Erebor''' can refer to:
==Middle-earth==
*'''[[Lonely Mountain]]''', a mountain in the North-East of [[Rhovanion]], also known as '''''Erebor'''''

==Adaptations==
===Games===
*''[[Erebor (The One Ring role-playing game)|Erebor - The Lonely Mountain]]'', a supplement for [[The One Ring (role-playing game)]]

===Music===
*[[Erebor|Erebor (soundtrack)]], an exclusive bonus track of ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack - Special Edition]]''
